articles.title: Afghanistan earthquake Live Updates: Death toll is 920 now as 6.0 magnitude earthquake hits Paktika province - The Indian Express
articles.description: Afghanistan earthquake Live Updates: The European seismological agency, EMSC, said the earthquake's tremors were felt over 500 kilometres (310 miles) by 119 million people across Afghanistan, Pakistan and India.
articles.content:

articles.title: Latest Russia-Ukraine War news: Live updates - The Washington Post
articles.description: The Ukrainian president is conducting a marathon session of calls with leaders across the continent ahead of the European Commission summit.

articles.title: Moscow and NATO could be about to clash over Russia's European exclave Kaliningrad - CNBC
articles.description: A new front in tensions between Russia and NATO has opened up. This time, it's over the small exclave of Kaliningrad.
articles.content: A sign reading 'Kaliningrad' stands atop the main city's south railway station. Kaliningrad is a small Russian exclave located on the Baltic Sea and sandwiched between Lithuania and Poland. It has be… [+7787 chars]

articles.title: European Tour returns to Singapore in 2023, first time in 9 years - CNA
articles.description: SINGAPORE: The DP World Tour will return to Singapore in 2023 for the first time in nine years, as the golf organisation beefs up its Asian footprint, it said on Tuesday (Jun 21).
